title: What BTS song should I use as a lyric prank on my best friend? - Quora

response.answer_text: Nice request User-10034245450301575149 There might be really deep and meaningful lyrics, but no offense intended. (어디에서 왔는지) - Color Coded Lyrics  I don’t think that every song can be used fully because of the little details of places and names BTS gives. But you can always change that. I’ll say this again. I do not intend to offend anyone with any of these lyrics.
